strapiPost.title: First Steps
strapiPost.content:
Those of you who frequent Fayetteville have probably seen the progression of the construction just west of West Drake Street and North Gregg. What you’ve been watching is the first project in the Drake Farms development, and it is nearing completion. 

  • One down: The building is The Pendergraft Building, and will feature 12,000 sq/ft of leased space. As the first building it is setting the tone for what is to follow — retail shops, restaurants and cafes. 
  • Material: The native structure is made of stone, crafted wood and copper material, capturing “the scale and character of urban life in Northwest Arkansas.” Construction is on track to finish in November of this year. 

Check out a presentation of the building HERE.
